name: google-sheets
label: Google Sheets
description: Google Sheets is a web-based application that enables users to create, update and modify spreadsheets and share the data online in real time.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Unique Client ID of the Google Sheets that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Google Sheets API.
fields.tooltip: Unique Client ID of the Google Sheets that is used to create an authentication token required to access the Google Sheets API.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Unique Client Secret of the Google Sheets that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the client secret, see https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/oauth2/web-server.
fields.tooltip: Unique Client Secret of the Google Sheets that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Authorization Code
fields.name: code
fields.tooltip: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Accessing the Google Sheets API section.
fields.description: The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Accessing the Google Sheets API section.

fields.title: Redirect URL
fields.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.
fields.name: redirect_url
fields.tooltip: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Spreadsheet
operations.description: Creates a spreadsheet, returning the newly created spreadsheet based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specify the title of the spreadsheet based on which you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the title of the spreadsheet based on which you want to create.

parameters.title: Locale/Language
parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Specify the locale of the spreadsheet in one of the following formats: en, fil, or en_US. Note: When updating this field, not all locales/languages are supported.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the locale of the spreadsheet in one of the following formats: en, fil, or en_US. Note: When updating this field, not all locales/languages are supported.

parameters.title: Recalculation Interval
parameters.name: autoRecalc
parameters.description: Select the amount of time to wait before volatile functions are recalculated. You can choose from the following options: Recalculation Interval Unspecified, On Change (default), Minute, or Hour.
parameters.tooltip: Select the amount of time to wait before volatile functions are recalculated. You can choose from the following options: Recalculation Interval Unspecified, On Change (default), Minute, or Hour.

parameters.title: TimeZone
parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.description: Specify the time zone of the spreadsheet, in CLDR format such as America/New_York. If the time zone isn't recognized, this may be a custom time zone such as GMT-07:00.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time zone of the spreadsheet, in CLDR format such as America/New_York. If the time zone isn't recognized, this may be a custom time zone such as GMT-07:00.

parameters.title: Maximum Iterations
parameters.name: maxIterations
parameters.description: When iterative calculation is enabled, the maximum number of calculation rounds to perform.
parameters.tooltip: When iterative calculation is enabled, the maximum number of calculation rounds to perform.

parameters.title: Convergence Threshold
parameters.name: convergenceThreshold
parameters.description: When iterative calculation is enabled and successive results differ by less than this threshold value, the calculation rounds stop.
parameters.tooltip: When iterative calculation is enabled and successive results differ by less than this threshold value, the calculation rounds stop.

parameters.title: Primary Font Family
parameters.name: primaryFontFamily
parameters.description: Specify the name of the primary font family based on which you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the primary font family based on which you want to create.

parameters.title: Theme Colors
parameters.name: themeColors
parameters.description: Specify the spreadsheet theme color pairs in json format. To update you must provide all theme color pairs.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the spreadsheet theme color pairs in json format. To update you must provide all theme color pairs.

parameters.title: Sheets
parameters.name: sheets
parameters.description: Specify the sheet in a spreadsheet based on which you want to create.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sheet in a spreadsheet based on which you want to create.

parameters.title: Named Ranges
parameters.name: namedRanges
parameters.description: Specify the named ranges defined in a spreadsheet based on which you want to create. For information on how to get the ranges, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/reference/rest/v4/spreadsheets/other#GridRange
parameters.tooltip: Specify the named ranges defined in a spreadsheet based on which you want to create.

parameters.title: Developer Metadata
parameters.name: developerMetadata
parameters.description: Specify the developer metadata associated with a spreadsheet.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the developer metadata associated with a spreadsheet.

parameters.title: Data Sources
parameters.name: dataSources
parameters.description: Specify the list of external data sources connected with the spreadsheet.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of external data sources connected with the spreadsheet.

operations.title: Get Spreadsheet Details
operations.description: Retrieves the spreadsheet details from Google Sheets based on the spreadsheet ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to retrieve spreadsheet details from Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to retrieve spreadsheet details from Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Ranges
parameters.name: ranges
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated list of ranges to retrieve from the spreadsheet. For information on how to get the ranges, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#expandable-1
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated list of ranges to retrieve from the spreadsheet.

parameters.title: Include Grid Data
parameters.name: includeGridData
parameters.description: Select this option if grid data should be returned. This parameter is ignored if a field mask was set in the request.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option if grid data should be returned. This parameter is ignored if a field mask was set in the request.

operations.title: Filter Spreadsheet
operations.description: Retrieves the spreadsheet details from Google Sheets based on the spreadsheet ID and data filters parameter you have specified.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to retrieve spreadsheet details from Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to retrieve spreadsheet details from Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Data Filters
parameters.name: dataFilters
parameters.description: Specify the DataFilters used to select which ranges to retrieve from the spreadsheet. For information on how to get the grid range, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/reference/rest/v4/spreadsheets/other#GridRange
parameters.tooltip: Specify the DataFilters used to select which ranges to retrieve from the spreadsheet.

parameters.title: Include Grid Data
parameters.name: includeGridData
parameters.description: Select this option if grid data should be returned. This parameter is ignored if a field mask was set in the request.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option if grid data should be returned. This parameter is ignored if a field mask was set in the request.

operations.title: Add Row to a Spreadsheet
operations.description: Appends values to a spreadsheet. The input range is used to search for existing data and find a "table" within that range. Values will be appended to the next row of the table, starting with the first column of the table.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to update spreadsheet in Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to update spreadsheet in Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Range
parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Specify the A1 notation of a range to search for a logical table of data. Values are appended after the last row of the table. For information on how to get the ranges, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#expandable-1
parameters.tooltip: Specif the A1 notation of a range to search for a logical table of data. Values are appended after the last row of the table.

parameters.title: Value Input Option
parameters.name: valueInputOption
parameters.description: Select the input data should be interpreted. You can choose from the following options: Raw or User Entered.
parameters.tooltip: Select the input data should be interpreted. You can choose from the following options: Raw or User Entered.

parameters.title: Insert Data Option
parameters.name: insertDataOption
parameters.description: Select the input data should be inserted. You can choose from the following options: Overwrite or Insert Rows.
parameters.tooltip: Select the input data should be inserted. You can choose from the following options: Overwrite or Insert Rows.

parameters.title: Include Values in Response
parameters.name: includeValuesInResponse
parameters.description: Determines if the update response should include the values of the cells that were appended. By default, responses do not include the updated values.
parameters.tooltip: Determines if the update response should include the values of the cells that were appended. By default, responses do not include the updated values.

parameters.title: Response Value Render Option
parameters.name: responseValueRenderOption
parameters.description: Determines how values in the response should be rendered. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value, or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.
parameters.tooltip: Determines how values in the response should be rendered. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value, or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.

parameters.title: Response DateTime Render Option
parameters.name: responseDateTimeRenderOption
parameters.description: Determines how dates, times, and durations in the response should be rendered. This is ignored if responseValueRenderOption is Formatted Value. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String. The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.
parameters.tooltip: Determines how dates, times, and durations in the response should be rendered. This is ignored if responseValueRenderOption is Formatted Value. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String. The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.

parameters.title: Major Dimension
parameters.name: majorDimension
parameters.description: Specify the major dimension that results should use. You can choose from the following options: Dimension Unspecified, Rows, or Columns.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the major dimension that results should use. You can choose from the following options: Dimension Unspecified, Rows, or Columns.

parameters.title: Data
parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Specify the new values to apply to the spreadsheet.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the new values to apply to the spreadsheet.

operations.title: Get Spreadsheet Rows
operations.description: Returns one or more ranges of values from a spreadsheet based on the spreadsheet ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to retrieve rows from Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to retrieve rows from Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Range
parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated list of A1 notation or R1C1 notation of the range to retrieve values from. For information on how to get the ranges, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#expandable-1
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated list of A1 notation or R1C1 notation of the range to retrieve values from.

parameters.title: Major Dimension
parameters.name: majorDimension
parameters.description: Specify the major dimension that results should use. You can choose from the following options: Dimension Unspecified, Rows, or Columns.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the major dimension that results should use. You can choose from the following options: Dimension Unspecified, Rows, or Columns.

parameters.title: Value Render Option
parameters.name: valueRenderOption
parameters.description: How values should be represented in the output. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.
parameters.tooltip: How values should be represented in the output. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.

parameters.title: DateTime Render Option
parameters.name: dateTimeRenderOption
parameters.description: How dates, times, and durations should be represented in the output. This is ignored if valueRenderOption is Formatted Value. Specify the major dimension that results should use. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String.The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.
parameters.tooltip: How dates, times, and durations should be represented in the output. This is ignored if valueRenderOption is Formatted Value. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.

operations.title: Updates Rows in a Spreadsheet
operations.description: Update an values in one or more ranges of a spreadsheet based on the spreadsheet ID, valueInputOption and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to update rows in Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to update rows in Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Value Input Option
parameters.name: valueInputOption
parameters.description: Specify the input data should be interpreted. You can choose from the following options: Raw or User Entered.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the input data should be interpreted. You can choose from the following options: Raw or User Entered.

parameters.title: Data
parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Specify the new values to apply to the spreadsheet.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the new values to apply to the spreadsheet.

parameters.title: Include Values in Response
parameters.name: includeValuesInResponse
parameters.description: Determines if the update response should include the values of the cells that were appended. By default, responses do not include the updated values.
parameters.tooltip: Determines if the update response should include the values of the cells that were appended. By default, responses do not include the updated values.

parameters.title: Response Value Render Option
parameters.name: responseValueRenderOption
parameters.description: Determines how values in the response should be rendered. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value, or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.
parameters.tooltip: Determines how values in the response should be rendered. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value, or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.

parameters.title: Response DateTime Render Option
parameters.name: responseDateTimeRenderOption
parameters.description: Determines how dates, times, and durations in the response should be rendered. This is ignored if responseValueRenderOption is Formatted Value. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String. The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.
parameters.tooltip: Determines how dates, times, and durations in the response should be rendered. This is ignored if responseValueRenderOption is Formatted Value. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String. The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.

operations.title: Update Rows of Spreadsheet by Filter
operations.description: Updates an values in one or more ranges of a spreadsheet based on the spreadsheet ID, valueInputOption, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to update rows in Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to update rows in Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Value Input Option
parameters.name: valueInputOption
parameters.description: Specify the input data should be interpreted. You can choose from the following options: Raw or User Entered.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the input data should be interpreted. You can choose from the following options: Raw or User Entered.

parameters.title: Data Filters
parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Specify the new values to apply to the spreadsheet. If more than one range is matched by the specified DataFilter the specified values are applied to all of those ranges. For information on how to get the grid range, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/reference/rest/v4/spreadsheets/other#GridRange
parameters.tooltip: Specify the new values to apply to the spreadsheet. If more than one range is matched by the specified DataFilter the specified values are applied to all of those ranges.

parameters.title: Include Values in Response
parameters.name: includeValuesInResponse
parameters.description: Determines if the update response should include the values of the cells that were appended. By default, responses do not include the updated values.
parameters.tooltip: Determines if the update response should include the values of the cells that were appended. By default, responses do not include the updated values.

parameters.title: Response Value Render Option
parameters.name: responseValueRenderOption
parameters.description: Determines how values in the response should be rendered. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value, or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.
parameters.tooltip: Determines how values in the response should be rendered. You can choose from the following options: Formatted Value, UnFormatted Value, or Formula. The default render option is Formatted Value.

parameters.title: Response DateTime Render Option
parameters.name: responseDateTimeRenderOption
parameters.description: Determines how dates, times, and durations in the response should be rendered. This is ignored if responseValueRenderOption is Formatted Value. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String. The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.
parameters.tooltip: Determines how dates, times, and durations in the response should be rendered. This is ignored if responseValueRenderOption is Formatted Value. You can choose from the following options: Serial Number or Formatted String. The default dateTime render option is Serial Number.

operations.title: Clear Rows from a Spreadsheet
operations.description: Clears one or more ranges of values from a spreadsheet based on the spreadsheet ID and one or more ranges. Only values are cleared -- all other properties of the cell (such as formatting and data validation) are kept.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to clear rows in Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to clear rows in Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Ranges
parameters.name: ranges
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated list of ranges to clear, in A1 notation or R1C1 notation. For information on how to get the ranges, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts#expandable-1
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated list of ranges to clear, in A1 notation or R1C1 notation.

operations.title: Clear Rows of Spreadsheet by Filter
operations.description: Clears one or more ranges of values from a spreadsheet based on the spreadsheet ID and one or more DataFilters. Ranges matching any of the specified data filters will be cleared. Only values are cleared -- all other properties of the cell (such as formatting, data validation, etc..) are kept.

parameters.title: Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to clear rows in Google Sheets.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet based on which you want to clear rows in Google Sheets.

parameters.title: Data Filters
parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Specify the DataFilters used to determine which ranges to clear. For information on how to get the grid range, see https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/reference/rest/v4/spreadsheets/other#GridRange
parameters.tooltip: Specify the DataFilters used to determine which ranges to clear.

operations.title: Move Sheet
operations.description: Copies a single sheet from a spreadsheet to another spreadsheet and retrieves the properties of the newly created sheet.

parameters.title: Source Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet containing the sheet to copy.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet containing the sheet to copy.

parameters.title: Source Sheet ID
parameters.name: sheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the sheet to copy.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the sheet to copy.

parameters.title: Destination Spreadsheet ID
parameters.name: destinationSpreadsheetId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet to copy the sheet to.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the spreadsheet to copy the sheet to.
